channel.title: How much players are in one area?
channel.description:
Like if I wanted to create an command/function that tells me how much players are in between x and y coords how could I do this? Example: How much players between 220, 440 and 300, 500
Thanks

item.title: How much players are in one area?
item.dc:creator: @lol_k lol k
item.description:
@lol_k wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:1, topic:417799”]Loop through all online player

player.getLocation().inBounds(x1, y1, x2, y2)

If that equals true count++[/quote]
Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: How much players are in one area?
